participant_1.background:
My dogs are my most valued possessions.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
my favorite food is italian.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.

participant_2.background:
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
i work for an architect firm.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.
i have an autograph collection with more than 2000 signatures.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It's going pretty good, just got back from a quilting retreat in the mountains!
Sounds like fun! I love to quilt but haven't had the time to make anything in a while.
You should come with me next time! We had a great time.
I would love to, but I work too much to have a lot of free time.
What do you do for work?
Oh cool! I've always been interested in architecture.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be stressful.
I bet it can! How do you relax after a long day at work?
I usually read a mystery novel or play Mortal Kombat.
I love to read mysteries too! I read a lot of them last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
That's awesome! I'm glad you found something to help you relax.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about being an architect?
I love the creative process of designing buildings.
That's awesome! I can imagine it's really rewarding to see your designs come to life.
It is! It's so much fun to see people enjoy the spaces I've created.
That's wonderful! Thanks for sharing your job with me. It sounds really interesting.
